response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $15,000 to us, reflecting its unique features and the dedication of our team behind it. We believe it could be a valuable asset for you, offering unparalleled benefits and functionality. Considering its worth and the opportunity it presents, we kindly invite you to consider acquiring it for $14,500. We're confident this price reflects both the value of the product and our commitment to making it accessible to discerning individuals like yourself. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 14500}
